com.ogprover.thmprover
Interface TheoremProver

All Known Implementing Classes:
AlgebraicMethodProver, WuMethodProver
public interface TheoremProver

Interface description:
Main interface for theorem provers.

Version:
1.00
Author:
Ivan Petrovic

Field Summary
static int THEO_PROVE_RET_CODE_FALSE
          theorem's statement is disproved
static int THEO_PROVE_RET_CODE_TRUE
          therem's statement is proved
static int THEO_PROVE_RET_CODE_UNKNOWN
          it is not clear whether theorem is true or false (it cannot be proved)
static int THEO_PROVE_TYPE_ALG
          algebraic (coordinate-based) method
static int THEO_PROVE_TYPE_NONALG
          coordinate-free method
static int TP_TYPE_AREA
           
static int TP_TYPE_FREE_ANGLE
           
static int TP_TYPE_GROEBNER
           
static int TP_TYPE_WU
           
 
Method Summary
 int prove()
          Method for proving geometry theorems; it returns some of TheoremProver.THEO_PROVE_RET_CODE_xxx codes, or specific error code (one of GCLCProverConstants.ERR_CODE_xxx values).

Method Detail

prove

int prove()
Method for proving geometry theorems; it returns some of TheoremProver.THEO_PROVE_RET_CODE_xxx codes, or specific error code (one of GCLCProverConstants.ERR_CODE_xxx values).

Returns:
Success or error code
